titles.title: Intelligence and Law Enforcement Defense Pretrial Notification Act
A bill to amend the Federal Rules of Criminal Procedure to provide for notice prior to trial of a defense based upon public authority, and for other purposes.

action.text: Referred to House Committee on The Judiciary.
Referred to Subcommittee on Criminal Justice.

bill.summary: 1/7/1987--Introduced. Intelligence and Law Enforcement Defense Pretrial Notification Act - Amends the Federal Rules of Criminal Procedure to require pretrial notice from any defendant intending to claim a defense of actual or believed exercise of public authority on behalf of a law enforcement or Federal intelligence agency.
